body: If the yaoi yandere thing was taken out completely, I think an alternate timeline or universe where this exact corrupted Deku with this specific design as a main villain and Bakugou as MC would legit be amazing, ngl. Deku with this deranged design looks amazing
don't know what i was expecting from the cover and the literal first page of the manga but😭😭
Always Wanted to read this after watching season 1 and world heroes mission
This is actually a really good conceptualization of what would have happened to Izuku if things kept playing out how they were back in episode 1

Omfg that was amazing!!!!!!
HE KILLED HIM!!!!!!!!!!
That's fucking awsome.
Can I have more dead Bakugou (with more tortue cuz he should suffer)?????/

And here is a good representation on why I believe deku and bakucuck would never be able to be in a relationship, and that all the fangirls and fucks that ship them together are delusional. Bakugo had traumatized deku, bullied him to the point of probably multiple suicide attempts, and physically beat on him.

So the only relationship bakucuck deserve is the end of a fuckin rifle and a bullet through his annoying ass brain.
njirr knp dh
A plausible alternate reality
11/10 I got a boner

...All for one? perhaps... 'Deku' stood up and waited for the TV to fully turn on. "Deku, you did a wonderful job to day, and a for your reward... you have 3 days off, but you can feel free to help out the others during their time creating havoc and chaos out-side. But thats up to you.." (BRO- THE FACT THAT I SPENT SO MUCH TIME MAKING THIS IS FUCKIN' AMAZING- BUT I MIGHT NOT CONTINUE THIS DUE TO ME BEING AN IDIOT AND BEING UNABLE TO THINK OF WHAT COULD HAPPEN NEXT SO PLEASE GIVE ME IDEAS OF SOMETHING- AJEFKAJYEFHAJKEFJ-) P

...of the massacre he created, he went back to the villain lair. To his surprise, toga was there waiting for him, patiently... "Soooo~ Ya got anything for me, Sweetheart??~~" Toga said in a lustful voice (is lustful even a word???-), 'Deku' felt.. a bit turned on by this considering the tone in her voice, but he repented and said "Toga, i thought i told you not to call me that... But yeah, i do. Here *he handed the blood he got* (I FORGOT TO MENTION THAT DEKU TRIED TO SAVE SOME BLOOD FOR TOGA BC HE SECRETLY HAD A CRUSH ON HER SFHBKFSZHBF ((BTW I DO NOT SHIP 'STRONG BLOOD' I JUST THOUGHT IT WAS FITTING ASHFB-(deku x toga a ship name i made lol))))" Toga was filled with glee, and accepted the blood happily. "Rough day huh, Cap'n?" A sudden voice came out of no where, as 'Deku' took a seat "Yeaaaaaahhh~... But it was quite fun if i must be honest, you would've LOVED being there, Dabi." Ah it was dabi. At this point on 'Deku' just took a quick break, but suddenly the TV, could it be...

midoriya in the cover looks like hes about to commit mass genocide, and someone just tried to suffocate him using their bloody ass hand caused by midoriya but since they were on the verge of death they couldn't do much due to the amount of blood they lost during the fight with midoriya, as their final breath slipped by. They realized that 'Deku' is too powerful for for the world to handle, they realized that 'Deku' could be... All for One's new successor?... Unsure, and unable to think, they nearly forgot that they were dying, i mean, you sometimes loose track of whats happening when you're on the brink of death...R-ri-ig-ght? After that, they died. 'Deku', on the other hand, was able to inherit his quirk by taking it has his own "All thought his quirk is quite useless considering it's nothing compared to Hitoshi's Quirk... I'll accept this for now, it's good enough and besides... Master has better quirks for me." 'Deku' Said in the most heartless tone ever. After he fled the scene...
